p: Cell cycle was analyzed using flow cytometry. After treatment, the detached cells in the medium were collected with PBS and combined with the remaining adherent cells. After centrifugation, cell pellets were resuspended and fixed with 70% ethanol at 4°C overnight, and then resuspended in 1.0 mg/ml RNase (Sigma). Subsequently, 50 μg/ml propidium iodide (PI, Sigma) stain solution was added, incubated in the dark for 30 min at room temperature, and finally analyzed by the GUAVA ® easyCyte™ 8HT flow cytometry (Millipore Corporation, USA).
